content.rendered:
Experience:

  • 5 years’ experience in assisting and supporting administrative tasks of a project in DoD/Federal environment

Assist in submitting operational documents, weekly Travel Schedule Status,  for approval and processing etc.

Education Requirement:

  • Bachelor’s degree (IT-related field preferred)

excerpt.rendered: Experience: Assist in submitting operational documents, weekly Travel Schedule Status,  for approval and processing etc. Education Requirement:
